definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
modal verb (e.g. 肯[ken3], 能[neng2], 會|会[hui4], 要[yao4], 該|该[gai1], 得[dei3], 願意|愿意[yuan4 yi4], 可以[ke3 yi3], 可能[ke3 neng2], 敢[gan3], 應該|应该[ying1 gai1]

sentences.english: Chapter III is the grammatical analysis of"Yizhoushu"Verbs.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是对《逸周书》动词的语法分析。

sentences.english: Verbs have to agree with their subjects.
sentences.chinese: 动词的形格数要与主语保持一致。

sentences.english: Transitive verb must be followed by an object.
sentences.chinese: 及物动词之后须带宾语。

sentences.english: What are some of the most commonly used phrasal verbs?
sentences.chinese: 那么有哪些是较为常用的短语动词表达呢？

sentences.english: Collective nouns are used with singular verbs.
sentences.chinese: 集合名词与单数动词连用。

sentences.english: These are stative verbs; they describe states or senses.
sentences.chinese: 这些动词是状态动词，用于表示状态或感觉。

sentences.english: These are stative verbs; they describe states or senses.
sentences.chinese: 这些动词是状态动词，用于表示状态或感觉。

sentences.english: These verbs refer to adverse criticism intended as a corrective or caution.
sentences.chinese: 这些动词都表示作为改善法或警告的反对性批评。

sentences.english: The most common copular verb is be.
I use a verb form in the example.
sentences.chinese: 我在示例中使用的是动词形式。

sentences.english: These verbs all refer to gradual change resulting in destruction or dissolution.
sentences.chinese: 这些动词都表示导致毁灭或分解的逐步变化。

sentences.english: Our technique also can be extended to verify intransitive noninterference smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 我们的技术还可以扩展顺利地验证不及物动词不干涉。

sentences.english: Modals go in front of the subject in questions.
sentences.chinese: 情态动词置于主语之前构成疑问句。

sentences.english: Most transitive verbs can take a reflexive pronoun.
sentences.chinese: 大部分及物动词可接反身代词作宾语。

sentences.english: My friend, love is a verb. Love – the feeling – is a fruit of love the verb.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的朋友，爱是一个动词。

sentences.english: VRC is a syntax structure consists of a verb and its resultative complement.
sentences.chinese: 动结式”是指动词带表示结果的补语组成的句法结构。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
